about.label: ABOUT US
about.title: SEDEC: a history, values, commitments
about.description: Leader in the wood construction market in Morocco, SEDEC has been developing wood construction solutions for over 50 years according to the best quality and durability standards. Since its creation in 1960, the company has actively participated in the development of infrastructure throughout Morocco through the construction of thousands of classrooms, housing, health dispensaries, mining villages and life bases for major projects (dams, highways, ports...), sports halls, vacation and leisure centers and other major achievements in the country.

solutions.title: Our construction solutions
solutions.subtitle: A complete range of modular wooden solutions, designed to adapt to all your architectural and environmental needs

proflex.title: SEDEC PROFLEX
proflex.description: Flexible modular solutions for all your construction projects

mob.title: SEDEC MOB
mob.description: Ecological and sustainable timber frame houses

featuredProjects.title: Featured Project
featuredProjects.subtitle: Discover our latest achievement: a modular construction combining modern design, energy performance and respect for the environment. A perfect example of our expertise in wood architecture.
